hero.name: Khaled Alabsi
hero.description: I design, build, and adapt agentic AI systems that turn legacy complexity into modern, intelligent platforms. From large language model orchestration to full-scale code migration, I guide organisations from manual workflows to resilient, data-driven products.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Agentic AI Strategist, Software Engineer & Legacy Modernizer
about.description: I specialise in creating agentic AI programmes that combine large language models, automation, and modern engineering. My focus is on translating legacy software and business processes into adaptive platforms that keep people in control while machines do the heavy lifting.
highlights: Architect AI agents that pair autonomy with human oversight for regulated industries
Translate legacy monoliths into AI-augmented services with measurable ROI
Design retrieval and orchestration pipelines that make LLMs production-ready
10+ years delivering enterprise software and migration initiatives
Blend software craftsmanship with practical AI research and experimentation
Hands-on with multi-agent frameworks, evaluators, and safety guardrails
Available worldwide for consulting, delivery leadership, and capability building
Focus: agentic AI adoption, LLM-driven legacy modernisation, and automation

experience.title: Agentic AI Programmes & Project Portfolio
experience.subtitle: Modernising legacy estates with large language models and automation

projects.title: Agentic Operations Control Tower
projects.description: Designed a multi-agent orchestration layer that coordinates service requests, documentation, and approvals across ERP and CRM systems. Delivered measurable reductions in manual handling and response times through AI-supervised automations.

projects.title: LLM-Guided Legacy Migration Factory
projects.description: Built a code modernisation pipeline that pairs static analysis with LLM copilots to refactor mainframe modules into Spring Boot microservices. Automated documentation, regression coverage, and knowledge capture for cross-functional teams.

projects.title: Manufacturing AI Knowledge Assistant
projects.description: Launched a multilingual agentic assistant that surfaces SOPs, sensor data, and troubleshooting steps for shop-floor teams. Combined retrieval-augmented generation with IoT feeds to resolve issues before downtime occurred.

projects.title: Banking Compliance Copilot
projects.description: Developed an LLM-driven review assistant for securities products that automates dossier assembly, flags anomalies, and accelerates approvals while maintaining audit trails and regulatory guardrails.

projects.title: Insurance Claims Intelligence Platform
projects.description: Modernised the claims lifecycle by combining event-driven services with LLM triage agents and fraud detection models. Reduced manual intake effort and ensured transparent, explainable claim decisions.

projects.title: Cloud Modernisation with AI Ops
projects.description: Led a cloud migration that embedded AI-driven observability, predictive scaling, and automated runbooks. Enabled platform teams to respond proactively to incidents with human-in-the-loop safeguards.

projects.title: Securities Platform Re-architecture
projects.description: Rebuilt a banking platform with modular micro frontends, LLM-assisted documentation workflows, and automated release gates. Improved delivery throughput while maintaining stringent compliance controls.

projects.title: Industrial Process Intelligence
projects.description: Implemented AI-driven monitoring for production lines using multivariate analytics, anomaly detection, and generative explanations. Delivered early warnings and remediation guidance through agentic copilots.

inspiration.title: Put Agentic AI to Work
inspiration.subtitle: Transformation happens when people, processes, and models collaborate
inspiration.description: Whether you need to migrate a legacy stack or launch a new capability, agentic AI can shorten delivery cycles, improve quality, and unlock new services. These are some of the high-impact entry points I deliver.

cta.title: Ready to activate your AI roadmap?
cta.description: Let's define the pilot, operating model, and guardrails that will make agentic AI sustainable inside your organisation.

items.description: Acceleration of code migration with LLM copilots
Increase in automation coverage across operations

points.title: Human-centred automation
points.description: Designs that keep subject-matter experts in the loop while agents automate the repetitive heavy lifting.

points.title: Legacy-first mindset
points.description: Deep experience untangling critical systems, mapping dependencies, and introducing AI safely and incrementally.

points.title: Operational excellence
points.description: Embedding observability, governance, and quality controls so AI solutions scale without surprises.

points.title: Research-led delivery
points.description: Continuous experimentation with the latest LLM tooling, evaluation techniques, and safety frameworks.

cta.title: Planning an AI or modernisation initiative?
cta.description: From strategy to implementation, I help teams adopt agentic AI responsibly and modernise faster.

steps.title: Assessment & Framing
steps.description: Map legacy assets, data flows, and target outcomes. Define success metrics and governance upfront.

steps.title: Experience & Architecture
steps.description: Design the agentic workflows, LLM stack, and integration pattern aligned to your teams and platforms.

steps.title: Pilot Build
steps.description: Develop the AI agents, connectors, and evaluation harness with agile, test-driven delivery.

steps.title: Hardening & Rollout
steps.description: Operationalise guardrails, monitoring, and change management for scaled adoption.

steps.title: Enablement & Handover
steps.description: Upskill teams, document playbooks, and embed continuous improvement rituals.

steps.title: Evolution & Optimisation
steps.description: Track value, iterate on prompts and models, and expand automation coverage responsibly.

contact.title: Let's Co-Create Your Next AI Breakthrough
contact.subtitle: Available for strategic engagements worldwide
contact.description: Need an agentic AI pilot, a legacy modernisation roadmap, or hands-on delivery leadership? I partner with organisations to deploy trustworthy AI systems that respect compliance, scale globally, and deliver measurable value.
